caption.p: Scanning electron microscopy (SEM) images of microcapsules using 500×, 1000×, and 6000× magnifications: GUM (gum arabic), SKIM (skim milk), BCYC (beta-cyclodextrin), MD (maltodextrin), SCA (sodium caseinate), RMD (resistant-maltodextrin). Images were prepared using microparticles which were spray-dried using 20% of wall materials.
